>
[Impossible Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=4990) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Sly Striker](/Feats.aspx?ID=4958)

</column>

---

Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming. Instead of dealing the damage from Sly Striker, you can deal your full sneak attack damage to a target even if the target isn’t off-guard.
name: Impossible Striker
